column5: Well my son Kaleb had his first soccer game/practice, the U4 league is just for fun .After soccer we loaded up the boat and he was very happy to go fishing ,we didn't catch any real big ones this time couple 11-12" perch most were 8-9" which I would rather eat over the 13-14+ jumbo's.Kaleb did really good with his hand me down rod that I gave him and reeled in a half dozen fish on his own and Mom and Dad ended up coming home with 25 perch and 3 silver bass for supper tomorrow night .Catchin all those perch really tired Kaleb out and I found the perfect spot for him to nap really glad I have this casting deck/rear seats.
yep.... kids can sleep anywhere... when they want to
Too funny. Glad you had fun Shawn
Firing up that motor would be an easy way to wake him up lol.  Sounds like a great day, kids are awesome.
Trust me after 2.5 hours of fishing with a 3 year old nap time is a nice break last thing I want to do is wake him up LOL now I have to thaw out the perch and clean them not a big fan of that part.
